Package me.aecsocket.calibre

Class CalibrePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • me.aecsocket.calibre.CalibrePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.loop.Tickable, org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
    public class CalibrePlugin
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
implements me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.loop.Tickable
    The main plugin class. Other plugins can hook into this by:
    • Adding this plugin as a loadbefore in the plugin.yml
    • Extending CalibreHook

      • loadSettings

        public me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.resource.DataResult<String,​String> loadSettings()
        Reloads settings from the settings file and applies some initial settings.
        Returns:
        A LoadResult of messages during loading.

      • loadLocales

        public me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.resource.DataResult<String,​String> loadLocales()
        Reloads languages and locales using LocaleManager.loadFrom(Gson, Plugin).
        Returns:
        A LoadResult of messages during loading.

      • loadRegistry

        public me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.resource.DataResult<String,​String> loadRegistry()
        Reloads all the items in the plugin's Registry using Registry.loadFrom(Gson, Plugin).

        Configured subdirectories:

        • component: CalibreComponent
        • blueprint: Blueprint
        Returns:
        A LoadResult of messages during loading.

      • cleanLoad

        public me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.resource.DataResult<String,​String> cleanLoad()
        Checks if the Plugin.getDataFolder() exists, and runs:
        1. loadSettings()
        2. loadLocales()
        3. loadRegistry()

        This version does not take into account hooks. Use load() to incorporate hooks.

        Returns:
        A LoadResult of messages during loading.

      • load

        public me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.resource.DataResult<String,​String> load()
        Clears the registry and locale manager, initializes hooks, then calls cleanLoad().
        Returns:
        A LoadResult of messages during loading.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of result.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the setting.
        type - The type of result.
        defaultValue - The default value if none were found in the settings file.
        Returns:
        The result.

      • gen

                  Object... args)

      • gen

        public String gen​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  String key,
                  Object... args)
        Generates some localized text for a Player's locale.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the locale from.
        key - The key of the string.
        args - The arguments used in TextUtils.format(String, Object...).
        Returns:
        The localized text.

      • gen

        public String gen​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                  String key,
                  Object... args)
        Generates some localized text for a CommandSender.

        If this is a Player, gen(Player, String, Object...) will be run. Otherwise, gen(String, Object...) will be run.

        Parameters:
        sender - The sender to generate for.
        key - The key of the string.
        args - The arguments used in TextUtils.format(String, Object...).
        Returns:
        The localized text.
